name: Herbie
description:
Herbie is a short adventure game about leaving your mother to go and live your life.

It has two endings.

Walkthrough/Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3vCBUuxbq90

A Kayabros game.

Design, code, music, sfx by Talha Kaya.
